body_html: I can't think of anything else right now. The problem is that we'd like to keep the modules as stateless as possible, and to isolate them from functions they use. I'd like to limit the leaks that way. I'll try to come up with something else, and if there's no other solution we'll have to add the flattening.

body: I can't think of anything else right now. The problem is that we'd like to keep the modules as stateless as possible, and to isolate them from functions they use. I'd like to limit the leaks that way. I'll try to come up with something else, and if there's no other solution we'll have to add the flattening.
